name: Shan Gui 2: Chapter 1 · 山桂贰：第一章
detailed_description:
Buy Bai Qu and get Shan Gui now

Buy Bai Qu now and you will get the newest version of Shan Gui 1 immediately, which contain 2012 version contents and voice remade.
PS: Purchase unauthorized version of Shan Gui won't get any new update content and technical support. Click here for more infomation. DMCA rights reserved.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/516600/


About the Game

As the autumn come, sweet osmanthus's fragrant is pervading Zijin Mountain again.
This is an AVG game produced by Magenta Factory, follow the story line of Shan Gui and Bai Qu, with an innovative mange-style display.
This is the Chapter 1 of whole game, Chapter 2 & 3 will publish later.
Whole story tells about He Jia and Han Hui's reunion, in the sweet and mild autumn season.
You will be guide by the girls, once again, enjoy a fantastic autumn journey of the ancient Chinese city of Nanjing.

Key Features

  • AVG in manga-style
  • Verrrrrrrrrrrrry attractive bgm
  • With only one end
  • A relax and gentle story

CV

Han Hui - Feng Cha Ruo Wu

He Jia - Yin Shui Jing
Li Qiucheng - Zuo Ye Yang Guang
He Ren - Xian Ta Wu Tong
He Dai - Ling Li Xin
Chen Kongling - Feng Si Jing
Er Yue Lan - Xin Yue Bing Bing　
Floral Goddess - Xian Ge
Rivulet Nymph - Zi Su Jiu Yue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
